original_solution_mapping.L1: He read 400 pages from the 500 page book because 500 x .8 = <<500*.8=400>>400
original_solution_mapping.L2: He read 200 pages from the 1000 page book because 1000 x (1/5) = <<1000*(1/5)=200>>200

original_solution_mapping.L4: He needs to read 200 more pages to reach 800 pages because 800 - 600 = <<800-600=200>>200

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1757.
    Returns: the number of more pages Arthur needs to read.
    """
    # L1
    book1_total_pages = 500 # 500-page book
    book1_percent_read = 0.8 # 80% of a 500-page book
    pages_read_book1 = book1_total_pages * book1_percent_read

    # L2
    book2_total_pages = 1000 # 1000 page book
    book2_fraction_read = Fraction(1, 5) # 1/5 of a 1000 page book
    pages_read_book2 = book2_total_pages * book2_fraction_read

    # L3
    total_pages_read = pages_read_book1 + pages_read_book2

    # L4
    reading_goal = 800 # 800 pages of reading over the summer
    pages_remaining = reading_goal - total_pages_read

    # FA
    answer = pages_remaining
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He read {pages_read_book1} pages from the {book1_total_pages} page book because {book1_total_pages} x {book1_percent_read} = <<{book1_total_pages}*{book1_percent_read}={pages_read_book1}>>{pages_read_book1}

He read {pages_read_book2} pages from the {book2_total_pages} page book because {book2_total_pages} x ({book2_fraction_read}) = <<{book2_total_pages}*({book2_fraction_read})={pages_read_book2}>>{pages_read_book2}
He has read {total_pages_read} pages in total.
He needs to read {pages_remaining} more pages to reach {reading_goal} pages because {reading_goal} - {total_pages_read} = <<{reading_goal}-{total_pages_read}={pages_remaining}>>{pages_remaining}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: He has read 600 pages in total.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: He needs to read 300 more pages to reach 800 pages because 800 - 500 = <<800-500=300>>300

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'book1_total_pages' (value: 500) was used instead of 'total_pages_read' (value: 600.0).
